attributes.action: allow the iplayer to be *initially* launched as a windows only service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We humbly ask the Prime Minister to take note of the silent majorty of potential iPlayer PC users who would suffer as a result of a very vocal minority of mac users.

The iPlayer is simply being launched first on windows, NOT exclusively on the platform.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
